channel.title: I really need to get the name of this game!
channel.description:
Please help me, i have played it 1.5yr ago and it was super great game i really loved it, but now i want to play it and i completely forgot it's name.
There were functions like you had a PROGRAM: Knife, its options can hack, move 3 squares or so.
Catapult, shoot 5 squares or so.
I can even drew up a quick pic.
[IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/5zkswh.png[/img]
And I think it begins of letter O (10% only sure..)
But its like computer hacking just a game, you can buy programs off shops like KNIFE, CATAPULT and so you battle in arenas.
And i remember BOSS had function SHUTDOWN it deleted 20 spaces near him.
If someone played it tell me the name or a link please I'm dying to play it again, i just told you what i remember off it..!! :)
